query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ai_score_correlation_analysis` (
	`id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
	`period_start` timestamp NOT NULL,
	`period_end` timestamp NOT NULL,
	`job_id` int,
	`department` varchar(100),
	`total_applications` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	`hired_count` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	`rejected_count` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	`correlation_coefficient` int NOT NULL,
	`p_value` int NOT NULL,
	`is_significant` boolean NOT NULL,
	`ai_score_ranges` text NOT NULL,
	`true_positives` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	`false_positives` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	`true_negatives` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	`false_negatives` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	`accuracy` int NOT NULL,
	`precision` int NOT NULL,
	`recall` int NOT NULL,
	`f1_score` int NOT NULL,
	`optimal_threshold` int,
	`confidence_level` int NOT NULL,
	`calculated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
	`created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
	CONSTRAINT `ai_score_correlation_analysis_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);
